title: Elements & Flame: An Amber Mountain Novel
description: After losing a hard fought battle, Suleima finds a new home in the wilderness outside a small town to heal her wounds and recover her Elemental magic.A small town which houses a werewolf pack.When that past begins to encroach on her new territory, she and her friends, new and old, must figure out a way to win this time.Will her dragon shifter best friend and the Alpha of the pack be enough to permanently remove the evil that threatens?Rumors of a flower hidden in a cave could be what they need to tip the scales in their favor. But to get to this cave, she must face challenges that threaten everything that she has ever known.**** Action Adventure Fantasy with Slow Burn Romance. Werewolves, Magic, Dragon shifters, Mythical Creatures. Join the characters in their Epic Journey to the top of a mountain.
author: Jillian Beane
